author: sky.cactus
content: The argument here can be simplified to "a 51% miner coalition can collude to censor transactions/non-colluding miners".

author: sky.cactus
content: This doesn't really have anything to do with 1559.  If miners are colluding to attack the network we have big problems both before and after London.  One of the big wins with Proof of Stake is that we can actually take action (after the fact) against such an attack.

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: Yup but 1559 provides a strong economic incentive to collude which didnt exist until now. And miner are too dumb to do it, but FB can act as coordination point + have dev capacity to ship geth mods + bundle it with MEV incentives for even stronger pressure

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: not saying itll happen, just hypothetical

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content:
"One of the big wins with Proof of Stake is that we can actually take action (after the fact) against such an attack."
Would love these conditions to be semi-solidified to avoid too much debate when they need to be actually enacted. Ethereum constitution.

author: sky.cactus
content: The economic incentive to collude is incredibly high without 1559.  You can double your income.

author: sky.cactus
content: The introduction of 1559 does not come anywhere close to a doubling of income.  While it does *increase* the economic incentive slightly, it isn't an order of magnitude increase (not even a doubling of the incentive).

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, FB as a coordination point is unrelated to 1559/London.  It is a coordination point regardless.

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content:
Isn't it a doubling?

author: ghosts_in_the_code

author: sky.cactus

author: sky.cactus
content:
51% censorship attack today doubles all miner rewards.
51% censorship attack after London doubles all miner rewards and increases fee revenue (base fee to miners).

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: Yup but fee revenue is also doubled hypothetically. Cause its shared by half as much of total hashpower

author: ghosts_in_the_code

author: sky.cactus
content:
Block reward of 2, if you collude you get double that (effectively) for the same hash power.
Base fee burn 0.5, if you collude you get that and it is doubled (effectively) for the same hash power.
So you go from 2 to 5, which is a 2.5x reward increase.
